name: BootB
overview:
BootB is the World’s Best Creative Department, bringing to life innovative ideas for business growth. Powered by crowdsourcing principals, BootB provides companies of all sizes with an “unlimited and borderless” route to creativity.

Companies get easy access to custom creative content from an enormous pool of creative talent from around the world. We count among our clients: Lego, Disney, Peugeot, EMI Music, UNIVERSAL PICTURES, Unicef and many others.

Creatives get unique opportunities to capitalize on their talent running no risks of not getting paid for their work.

BootB in a nutshell:

  • Available in 14 languages
  • Relying on over 23 000 Creators from 154 countries
  • Providing an average of 193 proposals for each creative challenge
  • Rewarding on average 4 000 USD for each creative challenge

We call it “Unlimited Creativityâ”!
